name: NSPersistentStoreDescription
desc: A description object used to create and load a persistent store.

items.name: init(url: URL)
items.desc: Initializes the receiver with a URL for the store.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: The URL that the store will use for its location.

items.name: var configuration: String?
items.desc: The name of the configuration used by this store.

items.name: var timeout: TimeInterval
items.desc: The connection timeout for the associated store.

items.name: var type: String
items.desc: The type of store this description represents.

items.name: var isReadOnly: Bool
items.desc: A flag that indicates whether this store will be read-only.

items.name: var shouldAddStoreAsynchronously: Bool
items.desc: A flag that determines whether the store is added asynchronously.

items.name: var shouldInferMappingModelAutomatically: Bool
items.desc: A flag indicating whether a mapping model should be created automatically.

items.name: var shouldMigrateStoreAutomatically: Bool
items.desc: A flag indicating whether the associated persistent store should be migrated automatically.

items.name: func setOption(NSObject?, forKey: String)
items.desc: Sets an option on the store.

items.name: func setValue(NSObject?, forPragmaNamed: String)
items.desc: Allows you to set pragmas for the SQLite store.

items.name: var options: [String : NSObject]
items.desc: A dictionary representation of the options set on the associated persistent store.

items.name: var sqlitePragmas: [String : NSObject]
items.desc: The SQLite pragmas set for the associated persistent store. (read-only)

items.name: var cloudKitContainerOptions: NSPersistentCloudKitContainerOptions?
items.desc: Options that customize how this store description aligns with a CloudKit database.
